verbose_text: Using in situ hybridization for Shh mRNA expression, we found that in contrast to the focal expression of Shh mRNA in taste cells within fungiform papillae of control mice (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), Shh mRNA is ectopically expressed in the non gustatory epithelium of Ring1a/b 2KO embryos (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG).
